'''1.7.10 Build 17'''<ref>{{link |url=http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog|title=MinecraftEdu Changelog|date=|website=|author=}}([https://web.archive.org/web/20170207182304/http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog Archive])</ref> is the seventeenth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on April 17, 2015. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]].<ref>{{Link|url=https://www.tumblr.com/mcedudev/116638230139/worldedit-missing-libraries|title=WorldEdit Missing Libraries|website=Tumblr|date=April 17, 2015}}</ref>

== Changes ==
* Removed "built in" WorldEdit. You can now get WorldEdit functionalities by downloading a server side mod from the online mod section of the Launcher.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Toggleable stuff like levers not working since forge update in b16.
* "Export to zip" not getting all necessary mod files for example when exporting a saved world to zip.
* Not being able to hide the Server Launcher button.
